proverb: Don’t cross the bridge until you come to it
Don’t make a mountain out of an anthill
Put your best foot forward
It’s better to be safe than sorry
Don’t bite off more than you can chew
translation: Не бери на себя слишком много

proverb: Still waters run deep
Curiosity killed the cat
translation: Любопытной Варваре на базаре нос оторвали

proverb: You scratch my back, I’ll scratch yours
Two wrongs don't make a right
The pen is mightier than the sword
The squeaky wheel gets the grease
translation: Под лежачий камень вода не течет

proverb: No man is an island
People who live in glass houses should not throw stones
translation: В чужом глазу видит соринку, а в своем бревна не замечает

proverb: Birds of a feather flock together
There's no such thing as a free lunch
The early bird catches the worm
translation: Кто рано встает, тому Бог подает

proverb: Beggars can't be choosers
Beauty is in the eye of the beholder
A penny saved is a penny earned
Absence makes the heart grow fonder
translation: Дальше с глаз — ближе к сердцу

proverb: A cat may look at a king
A little knowledge is a dangerous thing
Like father, like son
All good things must come to an end
One drop of poison infects the whole tun of wine
Easy come, easy go
You can’t have your cake and eat it too
translation: Любишь кататься, люби и саночки возить

proverb: A great dowry is a bed full of brambles
translation: Лучше на убогой жениться, чем с богатой браниться

proverb: A guilty conscience needs no accuser
A Jack of all trades is master of none
translation: За все берется, да не все удается

proverb: A liar is not believed when he speaks the truth
A little body often harbours a great soul
A rolling stone gathers no moss
translation: Кому на месте не сидится, тот добра не наживет

proverb: You cannot teach old dogs new tricks
translation: Старого пса к цепи не приучишь

proverb: Who keeps company with the wolf, will learn to howl
translation: С кем поведешься, от того и наберешься

proverb: When the fox preaches, take care of your geese
translation: Берегись крокодила, когда он слезы проливает

proverb: То throw a stone in one's own garden
A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush
translation: Лучше синица в руках, чем журавль в небе

proverb: A leopard cannot change its spots
A chain is only as strong as its weakest link
As the fool thinks, so the bell clinks
